---
title: GameProfile
---

Every player has their own [`GameProfile`](https://github.com/UndefinedCreations/Lynx/blob/master/common/src/main/kotlin/com/undefined/lynx/GameProfile.kt). This contains the players name and [skin](https://github.com/UndefinedCreations/Lynx/blob/master/common/src/main/kotlin/com/undefined/lynx/Skin.kt).

# Getting values
Lynx will automatically create two instances of this class. The first instance of this class is the Original `GameProfile`.
This instance contains the original name and skin of the player.

```java tab="Java"
GameProfile original = PlayerMetaUtil.getOriginalGameProfile(player);
```
```kotlin tab="Kotlin"
val original = player.getOriginalGameProfile()
```

The second instance of the class is the current profile with all the modified values. If you change a player name or skin this instance will have the modified value.

```java tab="Java"
GameProfile current = PlayerMetaUtil.getGameProfile(player);
```
```kotlin tab="Kotlin"
val current = player.getGameProfile()
```

You are also able to check if player has a modified `GameProfile`:

```java tab="Java"
boolean isModified = PlayerMetaUtil.hasModifiedGameProfile(player);
```
```kotlin tab="Kotlin"
val isModified = player.hasModifiedGameProfile()
```

# Modifying value
Now we get to the fun part. Changing the players GameProfile. We can do this by creating a new profile and setting it. In this example we will set the `GameProfile` to the name of `Lynx` and the skin values of `StillLutto`

<Callout title="Important" type="warn">
    Make sure the `GameProfile` name is less than 16 characters. If its longer it will crash your client.
</Callout>

```java tab="Java"
GameProfile customGameProfile = new GameProfile(
        "Lynx",
        new Skin(
           "",
           ""
        )
);

PlayerMetaUtil.setGameProfile(player, customGameProfile);
```
```kotlin tab="Kotlin"
val customGameProfile = GameProfile(
        "Lynx",
        Skin(
           "",
           ""
        )
)

player.setGameProfile(customGameProfile)
```

![GameProfile Example](https://cdn.undefinedcreations.com/lynx/playerMeta/game-profle.gif)
